lines.text: everyone who craps on you is not necessarily your enemy, and everyone who gets you out of crap is not necessarily your friend, and if you're warm and happy no matter where you are you should just keep your big mouth shut.
Killing a woman, it's not the same as killing a man. You have to pull the trigger a different way.

[One rifle-shot into a mangos, Miguel bites in another one]
I've just killed your brother.
Honey? I'm going to tear your heart out.
Listen, I'm in way over my head here mister. I just want out.
So, Joseph, let's go get Pearl a boyfriend.
Sure. And after that, if you don't mind, I'd like to go to the hospital.
Girl, get back here. Come here, girl.
I beat you to the buyers, and now I've beat you to the mark. I'm sorry, but I think I picked the wrong guy to be my hero.
[remarking at two police cruisers speeding by]
They get that way when you kill four of them.
Step outside and I will set you free.
